page.title: 07Post and 'Phone-Tamar Valley
page.content: There is a Telephone Exchange right next to our school. Until about seven years ago the numbers were Gunnislake but now it has switched to Tavistock. At Metherell, their numbers have been changed from St. Dominic to Liskeard. The mail that we get delivered comes from either Tavistock or Callington. Today it is a much worse delivery of mail than it was a few years ago. Nowadays there are two collections and one delivery a day but there used to be four collections and two deliveries a day. On top of that letters take a lot longer to arrive at the right houses. Being down in the valley Gunnislake gets a poor television reception so we have a television booster mast, but that doesn't get Channel Four.
